artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: building front with blue trim; two peaked tower-like roofs in blue; above windows first level "LINGERIE ROBES - MANTEAU"; above entry on roof facade "NOUVEAUTES" on both sides of projection. on front above entry "AMEUBLEMENTS" and "HABILLEMENTS"; relief masks on wither side of entry; decorative blue bowl-like objects with flowers on front
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [MAGASIN DE NOUVEAUTÉS]
title: Magasin de nouveautés, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
